title: Arsenal v Manchester City buildup, reaction to Matt Beard’s death and more – matchday live
summary: Join our writers for an exciting day of football coverage, highlighting key matches and player performances. Get insights and analysis as the action unfolds on the field. Stay tuned for updates and expert commentary throughout the day!

title: World Athletics Championships 2025: Keely Hodgkinson goes for gold in 800m and more – live
summary: Daniel Harris will provide updates from night nine of the Tokyo events, featuring the finals of the relay competitions. Tune in for insights and highlights from the thrilling races. Stay informed about the latest results and performances.

title: Keir Starmer set to announce UK recognition of Palestine later today - UK politics live
summary: An announcement from the Prime Minister is anticipated this afternoon, amid ongoing tensions and opposition from Israeli factions. The details of the announcement remain unclear, but it could have significant implications for current political dynamics. The situation continues to evolve as reactions unfold.

title: Esther Manito review – disjointed dispatches from the frontline of family life
summary: The standup features effective material addressing common middle-aged complaints. However, the routines lack cohesion and fail to form a cohesive performance. Overall, it feels scattered rather than well-rounded.

title: Meta exposé author faces bankruptcy after ban on criticising company
summary: Sarah Wynn-Williams could incur a $50,000 fine for each violation of a court order prohibiting her from criticizing Meta. The order is part of a legal dispute involving the social media giant. This restriction emphasizes the serious repercussions of breaching the agreement.
